[vc_row css_animation=”” row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”full_width” angled_section=”no” text_align=”left” background_image_as_pattern=”without_pattern”][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”47493″ img_size=”full” qode_css_animation=””][vc_column_text el_class=”page-title-overlap”]

STUDENT NETWORKS

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”” row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”full_width” angled_section=”no” text_align=”left” background_image_as_pattern=”without_pattern” z_index=””][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1575835851507{padding-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1580403655635{background-color: #ffffff !important;}” el_class=”content-section curved-bottom-right space16″]

At the initiative of both students and members of the academic community, a number of student networks have been established at UNIWA, which form core entities of spiritual, athletic, professional, social, and cultural development, both within and outside the university.

Student networks developed within UNIPA provide members of the academic community with the opportunity to pursue their interests and cultivate their talent through participation in a wide range of activities. 

In many cases, student networks enable their members to promote the concept of volunteering by implementing actions that have a positive impact on the local com-munity and abroad.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
